name: Grand Chef·Vegetable Soup
description: Thank you for your outstanding contribution in the field of making vegetable soup. The Cuisine Association hereby awards you this headwear to prove your long-lasting effort in studying food.

name: Grand Circlet
description: Headscarf worn by the highest instructor of the tribe.

name: Grand Circlet Blueprint
description: Headscarf worn by the highest instructor of the tribe.

name: Grand Circlet [1]
description: Headscarf worn by the highest instructor of the tribe.

name: Grape
description: A fresh and sour fruit that can restores 60 -90 points of SP.

name: Grape Juice
description: Fruit juice squeezed by grapes, More convenient for eating. It can restore 150-250 points of SP, and the effect is faster than that of direct eating.

name: Gratitude Card Chest
description: A special loot box for players who are always with RO. It probably contains nice cards.

name: Great Axe [1]
description: A big Two-Handed Axe with a large edge that will make the enemy frightened.

name: Great Axe [2]
description: A big Two-Handed Axe with a large edge that will make the enemy frightened.

name: Great Nature
description: The ore with earth attribute. After use, Your attack turns into earth attribute and the effect lasts 15 minutes.

name: Greaves
description: Made of steel, the boots focus on defense but not usability or comfort.
effect: Move Spd ＋8%,Green Steel Pike IV ＋ Greaves  VII ＋ Stone Buckler IV: Ignores 5% Def, ＋5% Atk

name: Green Clothing Dye
description: It can dye clothing materials green.

name: Green Dyestuffs
description: A magic potion to dye the hair green.

name: Green Feeler
description: Green tentacles of insect. You can feel rocker's jump when you wear it.

name: Green Herb
description: A raw material for producing green hair dyes.
